thread.title: ‘Suicide Squad’ (exec. producer Steve Mnuchin!) wins #Oscar for Best Makeup and then things got political
thread.title_full: ‘Suicide Squad’ (exec. producer Steve Mnuchin!) wins #Oscar for Best Makeup and then things got political

author: Greg P.
title: ‘Suicide Squad’ (exec. producer Steve Mnuchin!) wins #Oscar for Best Makeup and then things got political
text:
And keep your eyes on Mnuchin for 2017, too: Secretary Mnuchin produced my kids' fav movie of 2017 thus far: @LEGOBatmanMovie They're hoping it wins every award tonite. #Oscars2017 https://t.co/TTioNtLaSP 
— Mo Cowan (@mocowan) February 27, 2017 
Liberals, as expected, aren’t happy: Well, at least when they perp-walk Steven Mnuchin they can say they've arrested "a producer of the Oscar-winning SUICIDE SQUAD". #Oscars 
— Norm Wilner (@normwilner) February 27, 2017 
And things got a little political when winners Alessandro Bertolazzi, Giorgio Gregorini and Christopher Nelson gave their acceptance speech: "This is for the immigrants!" Cool, be sure to tell Steve Mnuchin, Suicide Squad producer and member of the Trump administration. #Oscars 
— Chase Mitchell (@ChaseMit) February 27, 2017 "For the Immigrants", only good part of Suicide Squad winning an #Oscar for Make up. 
— Joyce Karam (@Joyce_Karam) February 27, 2017 
Video here:
